name: Antar Tiqua
description:
Your report in Artantica turned upside down when sudden apocalytic blizzards and earthquakes shook the whole continent. By miracle you survived. But your guides are nowhere to be found and everything around you has changed. You are alone in a dangerous world with those mysterious everlasting fires as your only allies. Do something before the cold consumes you.

The game was made for IGU winter game jam : https://itch.io/jam/iguwinterjam

Will definitely make it a full game.

Credits :

Code, game design, level design, etc : Ema la Yon
